blogs.title: myfirst Blog
blogs.body: I picked interest in frontend devlopment one yaer ago so far i  have learnt I have been committed to it, aside learning webdevlopment skills, I have also worked on various other aspect of my life, I am have some ither skills which distinguishes me face any other work, I am time conscious, aspiring, wanting to be the best in anything I am doing. I am also very determined. Most importantly, i have learn to work with a team and work independently, my sister wa sa keypalyer in watching me eed my hunger to be graet with the right resources I needed, she is also my mentor> god crowned my effort gave me all that I prayed for which is a laptop and a job. I am grateful for one yaer of being a changed person
blogs.author: Ozav
